sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { AppData } from "./appdata"; import helpers from "./helpers"; const Employer = props => { let { state, dispatch } = React.useContext(AppData); const employer = props.employer; //console.log(employer); //let classy = str => dispatch({ type: "classify" }); /* class: classify(resume.history[x].name), name: resume.history[x].name, logo: resume.history[x].logo, offset: (y*80), location: resume.history[x].address, url: resume.history[x].url, title: resume.history[x].title, start: formatMonthYear(resume.history[x].start), end: formatMonthYear(resume.history[x].end), employment: resume.history[x].employment, description: resume.history[x].description, els: resume.history[x].details, sks: shuffle(resume.history[x].skills), fws: resume.history[x].frameworks, ims: resume.history[x].projects */ return (

Role: {employer.title}

{/*

Org: {{name}}

{{location}}
{{{start}}} to {{{end}}}
Capacity: {{employment}}
Show More Show Less
About {{name}}
{{{description}}}
Highlights & Responsibilities
    {{hl els}}
Skills, Tools...
    {{sk sks}}
Portfolio
    {{gy ims}}
*/} ); }; export default Employer;
